name: Charge (Artanis)
description: Allows Honor Guards to intercept nearby enemies, dealing 8 damage to the charged target. Also increases the movement speed of Honor Guards. Ability can only be used once every 10 seconds.

name: Whirlwind
description: Honor Guards gain the Whirlwind ability, which damages nearby enemies while active.

name: Trillic Compression Mesh
description: Dragoons gain +20 life, double shield recharge rate, and allows shields to recharge in combat.

name: Singularity Charge
description: Dragoons gain +2 weapon range.

name: Gravitic Boosters
description: Increases the movement speed of observers.

name: Double Graviton Beam
description: Phoenix Graviton Beam affects two enemies at once..

name: Anion Pulse-Crystals (Artanis)
description: Increases Phoenix's attack range by 2.

name: Psionic Storm
description: Allows High Templar to summon a storm of psionic energy, causing heavy damage to every unit in the target area.

name: Plasma Surge
description: Psionic Storm restores 36 shields to friendly units in the target area.

name: Khaydrian Amulet
description: High Templar and High Archons start with full energy..

name: Improved Barrier
description: Immortal Barrier absorbs twice as much damage.

name: Scarab Housing
description: Reavers can hold twice as many scarabs.

name: Solarite Payload
description: Reavers gain +25% splash damage radius.

name: Disintegration
description: Tempests gain the ability to deal damage over time to an enemy.

name: Metabolic Boost
description: Increases the movement speed of Zerglings

name: Hardened Carapace
description: Raptorlings gain +10 life.

name: Adrenal Glands
description: Increases the attack speed of Zerglings by 40%

name: Shredding Claws
description: Zergling attacks remove their target's armor for 10 seconds.

name: Heroic Fortitude (Kerrigan)
description: Kerrigan gains +200% life and +100% life regeneration.

name: Fury
description: Kerrigan gains +10% attack speed every time she attacks, up to 50%.

name: Chain Reaction
description: Kerrigan hits 4 additional enemies for 10 damage when attacking.

name: Ability Efficiency
description: Kerrigan has reduced cost for her abilities.

name: Muscular Augments
description: Increases Hydralisk movement speed by 25% and their attack range by +1.

name: Frenzy
description: Hydralisks gain the Frenzy ability, increasing attack speed by 50% for 15 seconds.

name: Ancillary Carapace
description: Hydralisk gains +20 maximum life.

name: Vicious Glaive
description: Brood Mutalisk attacks bounce three additional times, hitting up to six targets. Bounces also travel farther.

name: Severing Glaive
description: Brood Mutalisks deal full damage with each weapon bounce.

name: Seismic Spines
description: Lurkers gain +3 weapon range.

name: Chitinous Plating
description: Gives +2 armor to Torrasques.

name: Burrow Charge
description: Torrasques gain the Burrow Charge ability.

name: Tissue Assimilation
description: Torrasques restore 10 life per attack, plus 2 for each additional target cleaved.

name: Porous Cartilage
description: Brood Lords move twice as fast, and gain +100 life.

name: Heroic Fortitude (Zagara)
description: Zagara gains +200% life and +100% life regeneration.

name: Centrifugal Hooks
description: Splitterlings gain increased movement speed.

name: Corrosive Acid
description: Splitterlings deal 100% extra damage to the primary target when exploding.

name: Rupture
description: Splitterling blast radius increased by 50%.

name: Medusa Blades
description: Zagara deals area damage while attacking.

name: Protective Cover
description: Aberrations grant 50% damage reduction to units positioned beneath them.

name: Virulent Spores
description: Scourge deal 50% of their attack damage in a small area upon death.

name: Artillery Ducts
description: Bile Launchers gain increased range.

name: Hardened Carapace(Zagara)
description: Swarmlings gain +10 life.

name: Anaerobic Enhancement
description: Infested Civilians leap towards ground units.

name: Broodling Gestation
description: Infested Civilians spawn a broodling when they die.

name: Retinal Augmentation
description: Infested Marines gain +1 attack range.

name: Plagued Munitions
description: Infested Marines deal an extra 50 damage over 11 seconds to units they attack.

name: Saturated Cultures
description: Infested Diamondback Fungal Snare cooldown is reduced by 15 seconds.

name: Acidic Enzymes
description: Volatile Infested and Infested Siege Tanks gain +15 damage vs Armored units.

name: Rapid Hibernation
description: Infested Banshees gain the ability to burrow, regenerating 20 life per second.

name: Braced Exoskeleton
description: Infested Banshees gain +100 life.

name: Viral Contamination
description: Infested Liberators gain +100% damage against their primary target. Splash damage remains the same.

name: Pneumatized Carapace
description: Increases the movement speed of Overlords and Overseers.

name: Enhanced Mitochondria
description: Brood Queens gain +30% energy regeneration rate, and spawn with full energy.

name: Agressive Incubation
description: Infest Structure spawns 50% additional Broodlings.

name: Calcified Armor
description: Infested Bunkers gain +3 armor.

name: Crash Landing
description: Aleksander falls to the ground upon death, dealing 300 damage to nearby enemies, and allowing it to spawn infested for 5 seconds.

name: Shadow Charge
description: Centurions gain the ability to intercept nearby enemies. Also increases their movement speed.

name: Darkcoil
description: Centurions gain the ability to stun nearby enemies. Massive units are slowed. Also grants 100 shields for 7 seconds.

name: Blink
description: Allows Stalkers to teleport to a nearby target location.

name: Phase Reactor
description: Stalker Blink provides Cloak, and restores 80 shields over 4 seconds.

name: Stasis Calibration
description: Oracle Stasis Ward victims may now be attacked.

name: Shadow Charge
description: Centurions gain the ability to intercept nearby enemies. Also increases their movement speed.

name: Darkcoil
description: Centurions gain the ability to stun nearby enemies. Massive units are slowed. Also grants 100 shields for 7 seconds.

name: Blink
description: Allows Stalkers to teleport to a nearby target location.

name: Phase Reactor
description: Stalker Blink provides Cloak, and restores 80 shields over 4 seconds.

name: Shadow Fury
description: Dark Templar gain the ability to jump from target to target, dealing 20 (+15 vs. Light) damage with each jump. Hits 5 times.

name: Shadow Stride
description: Allows Dark Templar to teleport to a nearby target location.

name: Void Stasis
description: Dark Templar gain the ability to phase a unit or structure out of existence for 5 seconds.

name: Disruption Web
description: Corsairs gain the ability to create a web of energy on the ground that prevents enemy structures and ground units from attacking for 1.25 seconds.

name: Stealth Drive
description: Oracles and Corsairs become permanently cloaked.

name: Prismatic Range
description: Void Ray weapon range increases as it continues to attack.

name: Mind Control
description: Dark Archon gain the ability to take control of a targeted unit for 8 seconds. Heroic units are immune.

name: Argus Crystal
description: Dark Archons start with full energy.

name: Charge (Sentinel)
description: Allows Zealots to intercept nearby enemies. Also increases the movement speed of Zealots. Ability can only be used once every 7 seconds.

name: Reconstruction
description: Sentinels revive upon death. 90 second cooldown.

name: Advanced Repair Systems
description: Reconstruction Beam affects additional targets, up to a maximum of 5.

name: Optimized Ordnance
description: Defensive Structures gain +25% weapon speed. Defensive Structures gain +2 ability range and Shield Batteries gain the ability to grant a target struture a barrier that absorbs up to 100 damage for 7 seconds.

name: Reclamation
description: Energizers gain the ability to take control of mechanical units.

name: Phasing Armor (Mirage)
description: Mirages become invulnerable for 1.4 seconds when attacked. 5 second cooldown.

name: Anion Pulse-Crystals (Karax)
description: Mirage gains +2 weapon range.

name: Shadow Cannon
description: Immortals gain a powerful, single-target damage ability.

name: Extended Thermal Lance
description: Purifier Colossi gain +3 range

name: Fire Beam
description: Purifier Colossi ignite the ground when attacking, dealing an extra 150 damage over 4 seconds.

name: Repair Drones
description: Carriers gain small mechanical drones which repair mechanical units.

name: Graviton Catapult
description: Makes the Support Carrier launch interceptors more quickly. Also increases interceptor attack speed by 25%.

name: Infernal Pre-Igniter
description: Improves the Hellion's Infernal Flamethrower to deal +5 damage vs. light units and the Hellbat's Napalm Spray to deal +10 damage vs. light units.

name: Infernal Plating
description: Hellions and Hellbats gain +2 armor.

name: Ares-Class Targeting System (Swann)
description: Goliaths gain +3 anti-air weapon range and +1 ground weapon range.

name: Multi-Lock Weapons System
description: Goliaths can target ground and air units simultaneously.

name: Regenerative Bio-Steel
description: Vehicles and Ships regain 3 life per second.

name: Maelstrom Rounds
description: Siege Tanks gain +40 attack damage while in Siege Mode. Splash damage remains the same.

name: Targeting Optics
description: Cyclone Lock-On gains +3 Range.

name: Mag-Field Accelerator
description: Cyclone Lock-On gains +100% damage.

name: Pulse Amplifier
description: Increases the damage of Gemini Missiles by 100% and Bursts by 300% while the Wraith is moving.

name: Advanced Optics
description: Vehicles and Ships gain +1 weapon range.

name: Displacement Field
description: Wraiths move 20% faster and evade 20% of incoming attacks while cloaked.

name: Improved Nano-Repair
description: Science Vessel Nano-Repair no longer costs energy.

name: Defensive Matrix
description: Science Vessels gain the ability to surround targets with a temporary shield.

name: 330mm Barrage Cannon
description: Thors gain the 330mm Barrage Cannon ability.

name: Laser Drill Level 1
description: Drakken Laser Drill gains +10 damage.

name: Laser Drill Level 2
description: Drakken Laser Drill gains +20 damage.

name: Dissolving Acid
description: Ravasaurs gain +15 damage vs Armored targets.

name: Enlarged Parotid Glands
description: Ravasaurs gain +1 weapon range, and increased movement speed.

name: Glial Reconstruction
description: Primal Roaches and Primal Igniters gain increased movement speed.

name: Muscular Augments
description: Hydralisks gain +1 weapon range, and increased movement speed.

name: Concentrated Fire
description: Primal Igniters gain +15 damage vs Light targets.

name: Slicing Glave
description: Primal Mutalisks gain +100% damage vs. Air targets.

name: Shifting Carapace
description: Primal Mutalisks gain 50% damage reduction while moving.

name: Primal Reconstitution
description: Primal Mutalisks revive on death after a short time. Cannot occur more than once every 43 seconds.

name: Tenderize
description: Impalers tenderize their target, dealing 200 bonus damage over 7 seconds. Tenderized units which are Devoured by Dehaka will invoke 25% of the normal cooldown.

name: Aerial Burst Sacs
description: Creeper Hosts may target air units, and Explosive Creepers gain increased movement speed.

name: Explosive Spores
description: Primal Guardians gain the Explosive Spores ability, which deals 50 area damage after a brief delay.

name: Brutal Charge
description: Primal Ultralisks gain the Brutal Charge ability, which rushes to a target point. and deals 25 area damage.

name: Impaling Strike
description: Primal Ultralisk and Tyrannozor attacks stun the target for 1 second. This effect can occur every 5 seconds.

name: Healing Adaptation
description: Primal Ultralisks and Tyrannozors generate life quickly while out of combat.

name: Primordial Fury
description: Primal Guardians temporarily gain 10% weapon speed each time they attack, stacking up to 50%.

name: Barrage of Spikes
description: Tyrannozors gain the Barrage of Spikes ability, which deals 100 damage to all nearby enemies.

name: Tyrant's Protection
description: Tyrannozors grant +2 armor to nearby allies.

name: KD9a Implosion Core
description: Allows Tychus' Shredder Grenade to pull affected units to the center of its area of effect, stunning them for 1.4 seconds.

name: Vanadium Shell
description: Increases the damage of Tychus' Shredder Grenade by 50.

name: Kel-Morian Ripper Rounds
description: Tychus' attacks decrease the armor of their targets by 5 for 1.4 seconds.

name: SureShot Networked Helmet
description: Increases Tychus' weapon damage by 20% for each outlaw in his immediate vicinity.

name: LarsCorp G7 Charges
description: Increases the damage of Demolition Charge by 100%.

name: Moebius Restraint Matrix
description: Stuns and disables the detection of units hit by Demolition Charge.

name: Procyon Shade Suit
description: Prevents Crooked Sam from taking any damage and increases his movement speed by 80% for 4 seconds after being attacked. Cannot occur more than once every 11 seconds.

name: Enhanced Hostilities Kit
description: Reduces the charge-up time of Demolition Charge by 2.1 seconds each time Crooked Sam attacks.

name: SA-55 Thunderbolt Missiles
description: Equips Sirius with missiles that deal 100 damage to 8 air targets. Warhound turrets deal 100 to 2 air targets.

name: Moebius M34 Terror Rounds
description: Provides a 30% chance for Sirius to cast fear in a small area with each attack. Enemy units in the area will run around in fear for 1 second. Warhound Turrets have a 3% chance to cast Fear with each attack.

name: D99 Detonator
description: When Sirius is defeated, he triggers an explosion, dealing 300 damage to enemy units in an area around him. Warhound Turrets deal 50 damage on death.

name: Umojan Turret Frame
description: Increases the life and weapon damage of Sirius' Warhound Turrets by 75%.

name: High Capacity Containers
description: Increases the radius of Oil Spill by 100%.

name: Hades Oil
description: Improves the damage dealt by the Enflame effect from Oil Spill to deal +35 per second vs. light units.

name: Wildflame Fuel Additives
description: When units Enflamed by Oil Spill die, they explode, spreading Enflamed to enemy units in the area.

name: XCMC-670
description: Reduces all damage taken by Blaze to 30.

name: X-71 Impact Boots
description: Increases the stun duration and radius of Cannonball's Heavy Impact by 100%.

name: Critical Response System
description: Allows Cannonball to become immune to damage for 3.6 seconds and restores all his life when he takes fatal damage. Cannot occur more than once every 43 seconds.

name: Redline Power Coils
description: Increases Cannonball's attack speed by 3% each attack, up to a maximum of 60%. Increases his attack damage by 3 each attack, up to a maximum of 60.

name: M.A.L.I.C.E. Ammunition
description: Increases weapon damage by 100%.

name: Umojan Signal Modulator
description: Improves the healing rate of Rattlesnake's Revitalizers by 100%.

name: Moebius Aggression Blend
description: Units in range of a Revitalizer gain 15% additional attack speed.

name: Secret Stash Stimpack
description: Heals Rattlesnake for 3 life per second and increases his attack and movement speed for 11 seconds.

name: Hammer Munitions
description: Rattlesnake's attacks slow and deal 50% of their damage in an area of effect.

name: T-4 Cloudburst Shells
description: Increases the damage of Ultrasonic Pulse by 50%.

name: Ultrasonic Booster
description: Increases the radius of Ultrasonic Pulse by 50%.

name: Crystalline Amplifiers
description: Increases the duration of Ultrasonic Pulse by 100%.

name: N3 Networking
description: All nearby Outlaws have their primary ability charge-up times and cooldowns reduced by 20%.

name: Psionic Motivator
description: Dominate fully restores the target's life, shields, and energy and increases its attack speed by 75%.

name: Neural Disruption Device
description: Enemy units in an area around a dominated unit will attack each other for 2 seconds.

name: Psi Projector
description: Brings up to 5 enemy air units to the ground, allowing units to attack them as if they were ground units.

name: Type-88 Persuader
description: Increases the duration of Dominate by 100%.

name: Umojan Repair Nanites
description: Increases the immediate heal and periodic heal of Lt. Nikara's Restorative Burst by 100%.

name: Procyon Serum
description: Increases the healing rate of Lt. Nikara's super heal by 100%.

name: Procyon Twin Heal Beam Gauntlet
description: Allows Lt. Nikara to cast Super Heal on two targets at the same time.

name: XM-77 Matrix Generator
description: Enables Lt. Nikara to surround a target friendly unit with a shield that can absorb 400 damage over 14 seconds.

name: ITC-E Triggers
description: Increases the attack speed of Tychus, Crooked Sam, and Sirius by 25%.

name: Endurance Suppliments
description: Increases the life of Blaze, Cannonball, and Rattlesnake by 25%.

name: Flashforce GDM Visor
description: Provides Vega, Nux, and Nikara with detection allowing them to see cloaked and burrowed units.

name: Blood Shields
description: Supplicants gain +2 shield armor.

name: Soul Augmentation
description: Supplicants gain +25 shields.

name: Energy Shaping
description: Supplicants may attack air units.

name: Phasing Armor (Slayer)
description: Slayers become invulnerable for 1 seconds after being attacked. 5 second cooldown.

name: Cloaking Module
description: Havocs become permanently cloaked.

name: Detect Weakness
description: Havoc Target Lock grants an additional 15% bonus damage.

name: Bloodshard Resonance
description: Havoc Squad sight gains +3 radius, and Target Lock gains +3 range.

name: Fusion Mortars
description: Vanguards deal increased (+7) damage to armored units.

name: Matter Dispersion
description: Vanguards gain 50% splash damage radius.

name: Mind Blast
description: Ascendants gain Mind Blast, which deals 200 damage to an enemy.

name: Power Overwhelming
description: Ascendants gain 25% ability damage and +100 shields every time they use Sacrifice.

name: Chaotic Attunement
description: Ascendent Psionic Orb travels 25% further.

name: Aerial Tracking
description: Wrathwalkers may attack air units.

name: Rapid Power Cycling
description: Wrathwalker attacks requires less time to charge up, and gains 17% Weapon Speed.

name: Imposing Presence
description: Alarak stuns enemy units for 1.4 seconds when attacking. Heroic units are slowed.

name: Telekinesis
description: Alarak Destruction Wave knockback is doubled.

name: Jet Pack Overdrive
description: Allows the reaper to fly for 7 seconds. While flying, the Reaper can attack air units.

name: LD9 Cluster Charges
description: Reduces the cooldown of KD8 Charge by 7. When killed, the Reaper will throw multiple grenades towards the killing unit.

name: Tar Bombs
description: Hellions gain the Tar Bomb ability. Launches a tar bomb that deals 20 damage to the target unit. Nearby enemies have their movement speed reduced by 75% and attack range reduced by 3 for 4 seconds.

name: Aerosol Stim Emitters
description: Hellions and Hellbats transform 75% faster. When Hellions are killed, nearby allied units gain 25% movement speed and 15% attack speed for 11 seconds.

name: Immolation Fluid
description: Hellbat attacks cause enemies to burn for an additional 50 damage over 4 seconds.

name: Wildfire Explosives
description: Hellbat movement speed is increased by 50%. When hellbats are killed, they ignite the surrounding area. Enemies in the fire run around in fear for 0.7 seconds.

name: Multi-Threaded Sensors
description: Theia Ravens can target 2 additional enemies with Analyze Weakness.

name: Black Market Launchers
description: Widow Mine Sentinel Missile range is increased by 50%, and can burrow and unburrow much faster.

name: Executioner Missiles
description: Reduces Sentinel Missile cooldown by 14 seconds. When killed the Widow Mine will launch a missile which deals 40 (+40 vs. Shields) area damage. Affects ground units only.

name: WILD Missiles
description: Deimos Vikings gain the WILD Missiles ability. Launches 5 rockets at the target unit. Each rocket deals 25 (40 vs armored) damage.

name: Shredder Rounds
description: Deimos Vikings attacks in assault mode pierce, dealing damage to nearby units behind the target. Transform time reduced by 75%.

name: Tactical Jump
description: Asteria Wraiths, Deimos Vikings, and Theia Ravens can use Tactical Jump, warping them to any visible location.

name: Unregistered Cloaking System
description: Asteria Wraith cloak becomes permanent.

name: Trigger Override
description: Asteria Wraith attack speed increases by 10% each attack, up to a maximum of 100%.

name: Napalm Payload
description: Strike Fighter Precision Strikes ignite the target location with napalm. Enemy units that touch the napalm take an additional 100 damage over 7 seconds.

name: Overcharged Reactor
description: Sovereign Battlecruiser weapons systems are upgraded to a powerful particle cannon that deals 200 damage per attack.

name: Combat Shield
description: Marines get 10 life.

name: Concussive Shells
description: Upgrades the Marauder weapons to slow down opponents.

name: Incinerator Gauntlets
description: Firebats gain +40% damage radius.

name: Juggernaut Plating
description: Firebats gain +100 life and +2 armor.

name: Stabilizer Medpacks
description: Medics heal faster, can heal mechanical units, and healed units take 25% less damage

name: Replenishable Magazine
description: Vultures replenish a spider mine every 20 seconds

name: Cerberus Mines
description: Vulture spider mines gain 33% blast radius

name: Phobos Weapon Systems
description: Viking gain 2 air attack range, and 1 ground attack range.

name: Ripwave Missiles
description: Viking anti-air missiles deal area damage.

name: Advanced Siege Tech
description: Siege Tanks transform faster, and gain +3 armor in Siege Mode.

name: Afterburners
description: Vehicles and ships gain +30% movespeed.

name: Cloaking Field
description: Enables the Banshee cloak ability. Cloak renders the Banshees invisible to the enemies unless the unit is revealed by detectors or effects. Cloaked Banshees also have their range increased by 2.

name: Shockwave Missile Battery
description: Fires multiple missile bursts dealing damage in a line.

name: Weapon Refit
description: Enables the Battlecruiser Yamato Cannon.

name: Advanced Targetting Systems
description: Hyperion increases weapon damage of nearby units by 2.

name: Super Stimpack
description: Elite Marines gain an improved Stimpack which heals over time, in addition to increasing attack and move speed.

name: Laser Targeting System
description: Elite Marines gain +2 vision range and +1 weapon range.

name: Suppression Shells
description: Marauder Commando attacks temporarily slow attack and movement speeds. Has a reduced effect on heroic units. Massive units are immune.

name: Magrail Munitions
description: Marauder Commandos gain an additional weapon that deals 90 damage to their target every 20 seconds.

name: Caduceus Reactor
description: Nova gains +10 life regeneration rate.

name: Jump Jet Assault
description: Hellbat Rangers gain the ability to leap towards nearby enemy ground units, stunning enemy units on impact. Also briefly grants +4 armor.

name: Infernal Pre-Igniter
description: Improves the Hellion's Infernal Flamethrower to deal +5 damage to light units, and the Hellbat's Napalm Spray to deal +12 damage vs. light units.

name: EMP Round
description: Spec Ops Ghosts gain the EMP round ability, which deals 100 damage to the shields and depletes the energy of enemy units in the target area. Cloaked units are revealed for 7 seconds after being hit.

name: Triple Tap
description: Spec Ops Ghosts fire 2 additional shots that deal 85 damage each when using Snipe.

name: Ares-Class Targeting System (Strike Goliath)
description: Strike Goliaths gain +3 anti-air range, and +1 ground weapon range.

name: Lockdown Missiles
description: Strike Goliaths stun enemy mechanical air units for 2.1 seconds, and disable any detection. Heroic units are immune.

name: Advanced Cloaking Field
description: Covert Banshees become permanently cloaked.

name: Ghost Visor
description: Nova gains detection, allowing her to see and track cloaked and burrowed enemy units.

name: Graduating Range
description: Heavy Siege Tanks gain +1 weapon range every 2 seconds while in Siege Mode, up to a maximum of +5 additional range.

name: Smart Servos
description: Raid Liberators transform before modes four times faster.

name: Metal-bolic Boost
description: Mecha Zerglings get +60% movement speed.

name: Hardened Egonergy Shield
description: Mecha Zerglings reduce incoming damage to a maximum of 10. Drains 10 Egonergy per use.

name: Synthetic Adrenal Pumps
description: Mecha Zerglings gain +100% attack speed. Drains 1 Egonergy per second.

name: Egonergy Enhanced Explosives
description: Mecha Banelings adds their current Egonergy to its damage when it explodes.

name: Anti-Centripetal Rocket Servos
description: Mecha Banelings gain +15% movement speed, and may leap onto enemy units.

name: Egonergy Efficient Barrier
description: Mecha Baneling's Egonergy Impact Barrier absorbs twice as much damage per point of egonergy.

name: Hydra-lic Augments
description: Mecha Hydralisks gain +50% movement speed.

name: Erudition Missile Launchers
description: Mecha Hydralisks get a stronger anti-air attack, which may be enhanced by Egonergy.

name: Tyr-Class Targeting System
description: Mecha Hydralisks gain +3 range vs air units.

name: Focused Strike Algorithm
description: Mecha Lurkers gain the ability to deal 50 damage per second to a small area around a unit for 7 seconds, or until the unit is destroyed.

name: Extended Tunnel of TERROR Algorithm
description: Mecha Lurker's Tunnel of TERROR Algorithm gains +6 range.

name: Terraclean Solvent
description: Mecha Corruptors gain the ability to emit a stream that deals devastating damage to ground units over time.

name: Wide Area Cluster Busters
description: Mecha Corruptor's Cluster Busters gain 100% radius.

name: UMI-C Charging Protocol
description: Mecha Infestors gain the ability to restore 150 life, 100 Egonergy, and 100 energy to a friendly unit. Restores an additional 600 life, 200 Egonergy, and 200 energy over 14 seconds. The unit’s ability cooldown rate is increased by 25%.

name: BONUS Ravager!
description: Mecha Infestor's Roaches Away! Also spawns a Mecha Ravager.

name: Electrostatic Surprise!
description: Allows the Mecha Ultralisks's Vector Burrow Charge ability to stun mechanical in a large area.

name: Mecha Mooch Module
description: Grants the Mecha Ultralisk the ability to absorb 25 life from nearby enemy mechanical or friendly mechanical, and heal for that amount.

name: Stetmato Cannon
description: Allows Mecha Battlecarrier Lord to blast targets with a devastating plasma cannon, causing 300 damage and delusions of grandeur.

name: Mecha Locuscepter Bays
description: Allows the Mecha Battlecarrier Lord to build and launch 6 Mecha Locuscepters that automatically attack enemy ground units.

name: Chitanium Plating
description: Grants the Mecha Ultralisk +25% damage reduction.

name: Glial Reconstitution
description: Increases the movement speed of Vile Roaches by 33%

name: Tunneling Claws
description: Allows Vile Roaches to move while burrowed. Increases HP regen rate of burrowed roaches by 100%.

name: Adaptive Plating
description: Vile Roaches gain +6 armor when below 50% health.

name: Hydriodic Bile
description: Vile Roaches gain +8 damage vs light units.

name: Bio-Mechanical Transfusion
description: Swarm Queen Rapid Transfusion gains +10 healing, and may heal mechanical units.

name: Bloated Bile Ducts
description: Ravager Corrosive Bile impact size is increased by 150%.

name: Potent Bile
description: Ravager Corrosive Bile damage increased by 40.

name: Pressurized Glands
description: Swarm Host Locusts may attack air units.

name: Vicious Glave
description: Mutalisks attacks bounce three more times, hitting up to 6 targets. Increases glave's search radius from 3 to 4.

name: Sundering Glave
description: Mutalisk attacks deal +100% damage to armored enemies.

name: Pneumatized Carapace (Abathur)
description: Increases the movement speed of overseers.

name: Prolonged Dispersion
description: Guardians gain +3 weapon range.

name: Corrosive Spray
description: Devourer attacks deal area damage.

name: Virulent Microbes
description: Vipers abilities gain +4 cast range.

name: Incapacitator Shells
description: Allows the Aegis Guard's attacks to slow enemy units.

name: Neosteel Fortified Armor
description: Increases the life and armor of Supply Bunkers, Missile Turrets, and Earthsplitter Ordnance.

name: Aim-assist Embrasures
description: Further increases the range of units within Supply Bunkers by +1.

name: Dual Resuscitators
description: Allows Imperial Intercessors to heal two targets at the same time.

name: Scatter Veil
description: Allows Imperial Intercessors to permanently cloak and provides them with a shield that absorbs 100 damage.

name: Armament Stabilizers
description: Allows Shock Divisions to fire at air units at a reduced rate while being carried by an Imperial Intercessor. The Imperial Intercessor's abilities are disabled while the Shock Division is on board.

name: Smart Servos(Mengsk)
description: Reduces the transformation time of Shock Divisions, Blackhammers, and Sky Furies.

name: Aesir Turbines
description: Increases the movement speed of Sky Furies by 55%.

name: Bulwark Field
description: Blackhammers provide your nearby ground units +3 armor.

name: Field-Assist Targeting System
description: Allows Pride of Augustgrad to grant your nearby ground units +1 weapon range.

name: Hemispheric Accelerants
description: Increases the range of Earthsplitter Ordnance's Bombardment ability by +25.

name: Garrison Level 1
description: Earthsplitter attack speed increased to fire once every 10.7 seconds.

name: Garrison Level 2
description: Earthsplitter attack speed increased to fire once every 7.2 seconds.

name: Garrison Level 3
description: Earthsplitter attack speed increased to fire once every 5.4 seconds.

name: Purifier Armaments
description: Fenix gains +15 Weapon damage.

name: Observation Protocol
description: Fenix Cybros Arbiter Suit gains detection allows Fenix to detect cloaked units.

name: Charge (Fenix)
description: Allows Legionnaires to intercept nearby enemies, dealing 8 damage to the charged target. Permanently increases movement speed.

name: Psionic Projection
description: Adept attacks summon an invulnerable shade that attacks that will attack enemies for a short time, dealing 8 (11 vs. Light) damage.

name: Optimized Emitters
description: Conservator Protective Field duration increased by 100%.

name: Combat Sensor Array
description: Scouts and Mojo get +3 range against air, and +1 range against ground.

name: Cloaking Module (Disruptor)
description: Disruptors become permanently cloaked.

name: Purification Echo
description: Disruptor Purification Nova explodes after 1.4 seconds, dealing 75 (100 vs Shields) damage in a larger area.

name: Extended Thermal Lance
description: Colossi get +3 range.

name: Graviton Catapult (Fenix)
description: Makes the Carrier launch interceptors more quickly.

name: Debilitation System
description: Talis' Ricochet Glaive bounces an additional 5 times and causes every enemy unit hit to take additional damage for 5 seconds.

name: Empowered Blades
description: Kaldalis deals 9 area damage with each attack. Each Legionnaire increases this damage by +3.

name: Gravimetric Overload
description: Taldarin's attacks store 25% of the damage dealt on the target. When that unit is killed, it explodes, dealing all of the stored damage to nearby enemies. Each Immortal increases this by +10%.

name: Purification Blast
description: Warbringer fires a devastating blast that deals 150 damage to a target unit. Each Colossus increases this by 50 damage.

name: Suppression Procedure
description: Mojo fires a barrage of anti-matter missiles dealing 6 (12 vs armored) area damage and stunning nearby enemy units for 0.7 seconds. Each Scout increases this by +1 (+2 vs armored) damage.

name: Interdictors
description: Ciolarion deploys 2 Interdictors that automatically bomb the enemy ground units for 12 area damage. Each Carrier increases this by +3 damage.

name: A Strong Heart
description: Does nothing.

name: Covert Triage
description: Increases healing rate of Bio-Mechanical healing drone by 25% and cloaks units being healed by it.
